title: MAVERICKS: Success Secrets Of Top Peforming Schools
description: MAVERICKS: Success Secrets Of Top Performing Schools is an unforgettable journey into the world of ‘Mavericks’ – the very best, the brightest, and the ever top performing schools across the globe. It tries to unravel the old-aged mystery; What do these schools do different? Interestingly, some of the answers are hidden in some very little details, some of which the rest of other Institutions below their performance league do take for granted. MAVERICKS is simply an Insightful and at the same time an illuminative read.
author: Francis Otieno
